critique: The document is an executive order amending a previous order regarding financial losses sustained by US personnel in foreign countries due to currency fluctuations. It focuses on the specific case of personnel serving on US vessels stationed in foreign waters and clarifies the definition of 'stationed in foreign waters' for the purpose of these regulations. There is no obvious ideological tilt, immigration stance, or emphasis on security vs. liberty. The order seems primarily concerned with administrative and financial matters related to US personnel stationed abroad.
